background: A manufacturer needs to decide the production quantity of different parts, considering machine constraints, to maximize profit.
constraints: Each machine m can be used for up to Availability hours per month
Time required to produce a batch of part p on machine m plus the setup time for part p must not exceed the available time on machine m
Number of batches for each part is non-negative
objective: Maximize profit, which is the total revenue from selling the parts minus the total operating costs of the machines
description: How many batches of each part should the manufacturer produce each month to maximize profit, taking into account the number of machines (\param{M}), the number of types of parts (\param{P}), the time required to produce a batch on machine \param{m} for part \param{p} (\param{TimeRequired}), the cost of operating machine \param{m} for a month (\param{MachineCosts}), the time each machine \param{m} is available for production each month (\param{Availability}), the price at which part \param{p} can be sold (\param{Prices}), and the setup time required before producing a batch of part \param{p} (\param{SetupTime})?

parameters.definition: The number of types of parts to produce
The time required to produce a batch on machine m for part p
The cost of operating machine m for a month
The time each machine m is available for production each month
The price at which part p can be sold
The setup time required before producing a batch of part p
